game.title: Lieve Oma
game.description: It's the season for penny buns, Grandma forced you to come along a bit. But deep down you know it'll do you good and take your mind off of things. My grandmother is probably the most important person ever to me, as she provided me with the stability and care a child needs growing up. We all have or have had people helping us become a responsible and caring person, and this short narrative game is an ode to these people.
game.history: A few onths ago, my grandmother had a small household accident, with big consequences. One of those consequences was that I realised that she might not be around forever, and that I need to cherish her presence, so I decided to make this game as an ode to her sweetness and her giving me the space to be myself.

features.feature: A beautiful setting for a sweet story about a child bonding with their grandmother
It's the season for penny buns, so look for those! Maybe if you find a lot, Grandma'll treat you to a nice reward?
But deep down, you know the mushrooming's just an exuse Grandma came up with, to get you to talk about what's actually going on.
A soothing, silent piano soundtrack accompanying the story
